# Configuration.LivenessTemperatureThreshold property

The liveness temperature threshold. If it is 0 then it is disabled. By default this value is assigned to [`MaxFairSchedulingSteps`](MaxFairSchedulingSteps.md) / 2.

```csharp
public int LivenessTemperatureThreshold { get; }
```
